translation.Name: Gorinto
translation.Can gather from the four locations diago: Can gather from the four locations diagonally adjacent to your placement.
translation.Can gather from the four locations ortho: Can gather from the four locations orthogonally adjacent to your placement.
translation.Can gather from the four other spaces in: Can gather from the four other spaces in your placement’s column.
Can gather from the four other spaces in your placement’s row.
translation.Can gather from the stack you placed upo: Can gather from the stack you placed upon.
translation.You play with these two Goals and with t: You play with these two Goals and with these two Key Elements. Good luck and have fun !
translation.Victory ! You win the game with {score}: Victory ! You win the game with {score} Wisdom Points
translation.{player} wins the game with {score} Wisd: {player} wins the game with {score} Wisdom Points
translation.Victory ! You win the game with {score}: Victory ! You win the game with {score} Wisdom Points and {tiles} Elements
translation.{player} wins the game with {score} Wisd: {player} wins the game with {score} Wisdom Points and {tiles} Elements
translation.Marvelous ! {player1} and {player2} shar: Marvelous ! {player1} and {player2} share a harmonious victory with {score} Wisdom Points and {tiles} Elements
translation.Incredible ! {player1}, {player2} and {p: Incredible ! {player1}, {player2} and {player3} share a harmonious victory with {score} Wisdom Points and {tiles} Elements
translation.It can't be... It's a perfect tie ! All: It can't be... It's a perfect tie ! All players share a harmonious victory with {score} Wisdom Points and {tiles} Elements
translation.The season is cleared. Moving to the nex: The season is cleared. Moving to the next season...
Changing the first player coin' owner...
translation.You must take {quantity} tiles from the: You must take {quantity} tiles from the mountain
translation.{player} must take {quantity} tiles from: {player} must take {quantity} tiles from the mountain
translation.You have to move an element from one pat: You have to move an element from one path to the mountain
translation.{player} has to move an element from one: {player} has to move an element from one path to the mountain
translation.Score each stack that is the same height: Score each stack that is the same height as one or more of your other stacks.
translation.Score each stack that is a different hei: Score each stack that is a different height than all of your other stacks.
translation.Score each stack with an odd number of t: Score each stack with an odd number of tiles.
translation.Score each stack with an even number of: Score each stack with an even number of tiles.
translation.For each element, the player or players: For each element, the player or players with the tallest stack (of at least 1 tile) scores 3.
For each element, the player or players with the shortest stack (of at least 1 tile) scores 3.
translation.Score each stack that is a different hei: Score each stack that is a different height than the stack in the middle.
translation.Score the stack in the middle three time: Score the stack in the middle three times.
translation.Imagine your stacks lined up from shorte: Imagine your stacks lined up from shortest to tallest (including stacks of zero).
translation.Score your tallest stack and also any st: Score your tallest stack and also any stack tied with it. Score your shortest stack and also any stack tied with it.
translation.Score your tallest stack. Score your sho: Score your tallest stack. Score your shotest stack (of at least one tile) twice.
translation.Score twice the difference between your: Score twice the difference between your tallest stack and your shortest stack.
translation.A stack of zero may be counted as your s: A stack of zero may be counted as your shortest stack.
translation.If you have any empty stacks, score zero: If you have any empty stacks, score zero. Otherwise, score your shortest stack seven times.
translation.You will be eliminated and replaced by a: You will be eliminated and replaced by a robot playing at random.
The game will count as an overall loss.
translation.Your friends will be able to finish the: Your friends will be able to finish the game without you.

translation.Name: Gorinto
translation.Can gather from the four locations diago: Vous pouvez collecter à partir des quatre cases diagonalement adjacentes à votre placement.
translation.Can gather from the four locations ortho: Vous pouvez collecter à partir des quatre cases orthogonalement adjacentes à votre placement.
translation.Can gather from the four other spaces in: Vous pouvez collecter à partir des quatre autres cases de la colonne de votre placement.
Vous pouvez collecter à partir des quatre autres cases de la rangée de votre placement.
translation.Can gather from the stack you placed upo: Vous pouvez collecter à partir de la pile sur laquelle vous vous êtes placé.
translation.You play with these two Goals and with t: Vous jouez avec ces deux Objectifs et ces deux Eléments Clés. Bonne chance, et amusez vous !
translation.Victory ! You win the game with {score}: Victoire ! Vous remportez la partie avec {score} Points de Sagesse
translation.{player} wins the game with {score} Wisd: {player} remporte la partie avec {score} Points de Sagesse
translation.Victory ! You win the game with {score}: Victoire ! Vous remportez la partie avec {score} Points de Sagesse et {tiles} Eléments
translation.{player} wins the game with {score} Wisd: {player} remporte la partie avec {score} Points de Sagesse et {tiles} Eléments
translation.Marvelous ! {player1} and {player2} shar: Merveilleux ! {player1} et {player2} partagent une victoire harmonieuse avec {score} Points de Sagesse et {tiles} Eléments
translation.Incredible ! {player1}, {player2} and {p: Incroyable! {player1}, {player2} et {player3} partagent une victoire harmonieuse avec {score} Points de Sagesse et {tiles} Eléments
translation.It can't be... It's a perfect tie ! All: Ce n'est pas possible... C'est une égalité parfaite ! Tous les joueurs partagent une victoire harmonieuse avec {score} Points de Sagesse et {tiles} Eléments
translation.The season is cleared. Moving to the nex: La saison est terminée. Passage à la prochaine saison...
translation.You must take {quantity} tiles from the: Vous devez prendre {quantity} tuiles sur la montagne
translation.{player} must take {quantity} tiles from: {player} doit prendre {quantity} tuiles sur la montagne
translation.You have to move an element from one pat: Vous devez déplacer un élément depuis un chemin vers la montagne
translation.{player} has to move an element from one: {player} doit déplacer un élément depuis un chemin vers la montagne
translation.Score each stack that is the same height: Marquez les points de chaque pile de la même hauteur qu'une ou plusieurs de vos autres piles.
translation.Score each stack that is a different hei: Marquez les points de chaque pile d'une hauteur différente de toutes vos autres piles.
translation.Score each stack with an odd number of t: Marquez les points de chaque pile comportant un nombre impair de tuiles.
translation.Score each stack with an even number of: Marquez les points de chaque pile comportant un nombre pair de tuiles.
translation.For each element, the player or players: Pour chaque élément, le joueur ou les joueurs possédant la plus grande pile (au moins d'une tuile) marquent 3 points.
Pour chaque élément, le joueur ou les joueurs possédant la plus petite pile (au moins d'une tuile) marquent 3 points.
translation.Resolve the five elements separately: Résolvez chacun des cinq éléments séparément.
translation.Score each stack that is a different hei: Marquez les points de chaque pile dont la hauteur par rapport à la pile du milieu est différente.
translation.Score the stack in the middle three time: Marquez les points de la pile du milieu trois fois.
translation.Imagine your stacks lined up from shorte: Imaginez vos piles rangées de la plus petite à la plus grande (y compris les piles de zéro)
translation.Score your tallest stack and also any st: Marquez les points de votre plus grande pile ainsi que n'importe quelle pile à égalité avec elle. Marquez les points de votre plus petite pile ainsi que n'importe quelle pile à égalité avec elle.
translation.Score your tallest stack. Score your sho: Marquez les points de votre plus grande pile. Marquez les points de votre plus petite pile (d'au moins une tuile) deux fois.
translation.Score twice the difference between your: Marquez deux fois la différence entre votre plus grande pile et plus petite pile.
translation.A stack of zero may be counted as your s: Une pile de zéro peut compter comme votre pile la plus petite.
translation.If you have any empty stacks, score zero: Si vous avez des piles vides, ne marquez aucun points. Sinon, marquez les points de votre plus petite pile sept fois.
translation.You will be eliminated and replaced by a: Vous serez éliminé et remplacé par un robot jouant au hasard.
La partie comptera comme une défaite au classement général.
translation.Your friends will be able to finish the: Vos amis pourront terminer la partie sans vous.
